title: Expenses
context: ยง46-25.5 Expenses. Subject to section 78-32 and procedures prescribed by the director of finance of the county and approved by the mayor, all officers and employees of each county shall be entitled to travel or other necessary expenses in the performance of their official duties as provided by ordinance. [L 1975, c 34, ยง1; am L 2016, c 158, ยง2]
